channel.title: Hugo on Fred's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo on Fred's blog

item.title: Let's Make Our Own Blogs.
item.description: 1. Blog. Nowadays, we don’t have to write so much codes of front end, back-end or even set up resources for building a blog website. Thanks to our Open Source community, we can use many blog engines for setting our own blogs at all times, which is a very convenient way to make it done. This article will show you a basic process to complete this task. There are several engines you can use for your blog such as Jekyll, Octopress, Hexo and so on.
